changelog: ✨ DYNAMIC D&D FACTS: Implemented comprehensive fact system with 100+ curated facts covering 50 years of D&D history (1974-2024). Features include: curated lore database (editions, mechanics, monsters, NPCs, artifacts, planes, adventures), smart deduplication using Levenshtein distance & keyword overlap, session-based non-repetition (localStorage tracking), category diversity balancing (ensures mix of topics), AI generation for additional facts with validation, and progressive disclosure (surface → medium → deep lore). Facts never repeat until all 100+ shown, covers everything from THAC0 to Spelljammer to the Lady of Pain. No more boring repetition!

mcp.reason: 66% failure rate, zero unique value vs existing RAG system

archie2.reason: Over-engineered. Simple git-based version works better

coreFeatures.rag: AutoReferenceButler - 626 lines of intelligent context gathering
coreFeatures.semanticSearch: RAG Search System - 602 lines with hybrid vector+keyword search
coreFeatures.embeddings: Embedding Cache - 445 lines with 80-90% hit rate
coreFeatures.knowledgeGraph: Knowledge Graph - 553 lines with entity/relationship tracking
coreFeatures.database: pgvector with HNSW indexes for fast similarity search
coreFeatures.archie: Simple git-based maintenance - 466 lines, hourly cron, auto-commits fixes
